ActionForm

Implemented in class xdoclet.modules.apache.struts.ActionFormTagsHandler.

Block Tags:

forAllFormFields (block template)

Evaluates body for all fields included in form generation

ifUseMethodInForm (block template)

Evaluates the body if the method belongs in a given form.
